predicate.note: Frames file for 'authenticate' based on sentences in ULA Brown. No Verbnet entry, comparison with 'verify.'

roleset.name: Provide proof that a document is authentic

example.name: Transmissions
example.text: And no messages can be transmitted on these circuits until senders and receivers authenticate in advance by special codes that the messages actually come from their purported sources.
example.arg: that the messages actually come from their purported sources
